org.educraft.item

Class BaseNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.item.Item
      • org.educraft.item.BaseNumber

  • public class BaseNumber
extends net.minecraft.item.Item
    A number between 1 and org.educraft.EduCraft.MAX_NUMBER. This can be dropped by a hostile mob, or collected through other means.

        public java.lang.String getUnlocalizedName(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack is)

      • getSubItems

        public void getSubItems(int id,
               net.minecraft.creativetab.CreativeTabs tab,
               java.util.List list)
        Populates the given list with instances of this class. Every possible metadata value is added, so that we can display them all in the creative mode inventory.
        Overrides:
        getSubItems in class net.minecraft.item.Item
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the item to register
        tab - the creative tab to display the items in
        list - the list to add the metadata items to
